home.headline: Every contribution brings dreams closer and helps those who need it most. Join a community that makes a difference.

aboutUs.title: Mission & Values
aboutUs.subtitle: Learn about the purpose and goals that guide Benevolus.
aboutUs.mission_1: Our mission is to create an ecosystem based on altruism, providing a platform to manage charity campaigns and essential resources for people in vulnerable situations.
aboutUs.mission_2: We aim to grow alongside non-governmental organizations and help as many people as possible, always guided by the principle of building openly and transparently, following the open-source philosophy.
aboutUs.mission_3: Your participation is essential to make this mission a reality.
aboutUs.mission_cta: Your participation is essential to make this mission a reality.

goals.goal_platform: Build an international platform, starting with Brazil.
goals.goal_ai: Use artificial intelligence to make the platform easier to use (e.g., with automatic campaign translation).
goals.goal_zero_fees: Keep zero fees, except for infrastructure services.
goals.goal_tools: Provide tools that genuinely improve people's lives.
goals.goal_transparent: Ensure a clear and transparent administrative process.
goals.goal_responsibility: Take public responsibility for our actions.
goals.goal_community: Create an engaged developer community around the ecosystem.
goals.goal_feedback: Develop always based on user feedback and needs.

aboutUs.cta_description: Donate to campaigns or create your own. Every action counts.
